sentence: In early trading on Thursday, shares of Microsoft ( MSFT ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.7%.
Year to date, Microsoft registers a 4.3% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 0.1%.
Home Depot is showing a gain of 5.8% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Merck & Co. ( MRK ), trading flat on the day, and DuPont ( DD ), trading up 1.7% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
